contents.text: Welcome to Mattermark in San Francisco, where we help you research the companies and employees who matter most.
For product information and platform demos, press 1.
To learn about our data coverage and features, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a product specialist for data coverage and features.

navigationGoals: Get detailed information on Mattermark’s data coverage and feature set.
I’d like to learn if your platform includes veteran-owned companies in its data coverage and how to filter for them.
Review the platform’s data coverage metrics and feature specifications
I need someone to explain what company data you cover and how the features work.
I want to discuss with a specialist which data sets and metrics the platform covers, especially for early-stage biotech firms.

contents.text: To schedule a live demo of our platform, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a team member to schedule your live demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live demo of the Mattermark platform.
I want to set up a live walkthrough of the platform to see how I can track defense-sector startups’ growth metrics.
Schedule a live walkthrough of the Mattermark analytics platform
I’d like to set up a live demo so someone can walk me through the platform.
I’d like to book a live walkthrough of Mattermark to see how it can help me track startup growth for my thesis.

contents.text: For account management and support, press 2.
For billing and subscription inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify billing charges and update my subscription plan.
I need an invoice for my latest subscription payment for veteran business expense reimbursement.
Clarify details on my subscription billing and plan options
I have questions about my billing and subscription charges.
I need information on student/academic pricing and want to switch my subscription to the discounted plan.

contents.text: Please hold while we transfer you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot technical issues accessing the Mattermark platform.
I’m getting errors when I try to download the CSV export of company data.
Troubleshoot an API integration error with the platform
I’m having trouble logging in and need technical support.
I’m having trouble exporting my research data to CSV and need technical assistance.
